GeneralInfo.Name: Black Glass Nova
GeneralInfo.Author: Tgx
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
Tested on Mediaportal 1.1.
The resolution is 1280x720 and scales well to full HD.
Black Glass Nova skin is designed to be easy to use and has a simple and clear look. It should be controlled primarily with a remote or a keyboard.
BasicHome screen should be used as default home page.
Fanart Handler Plugin recommended.
The skin has been developed using Black Glass as codebase, so unsupported plugins should work with Black Glass plugin skin files (apart from some graphical anomalies). Blue3Wide plugin skin files for unsupported plugins should work apart from graphical glitches.
Hope you like it!
GeneralInfo.Tags: skin, 16:9, black glass, black glass nova, fanart
